title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 57 - Pullorum And Typhoid Disease
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 57 - Pullorum And Typhoid Disease

State Regulations
§ 57.1 - Program to control pullorum-typhoid disease of poultry
§ 57.2 - Definitions
§ 57.3 - General provisions
§ 57.4 - New york pullorum-typhoid clean flock classification
§ 57.5 - New york pullorum-typhoid clean hatchery classification
§ 57.6 - Incorporation by reference
§ 57.7 - Program to control salmonella enteritidis
§ 57.8 - Blood tests, environmental sample collection and bird selection for organ culture
§ 57.9 - Laboratory procedures
§ 57.10 - Requirements for primary breeding flocks (grandparent flocks) and multiplier breeding flocks (parent flocks)
§ 57.11 - Requirements for commercial pullet grower flocks
§ 57.12 - Requirements for producers
§ 57.13 - Requirements for empty commercial egg-producing poultry houses which have been found positive for salmonella enteritidis upon environmental culture
§ 57.14 - Requirements for egg-type poultry flocks found to have salmonella enteritidis contaminated environments
§ 57.15 - Requirements for commercial egg-producing poultry flocks identified for testing by trace-outs from flocks found positive for salmonella enteritidis
§ 57.16 - Requirements for egg-type poultry flocks found positive for salmonella enteritidis following organ culture
§ 57.17 - Requirements for commercial egg-producing poultry flocks suspected of causing human illness caused by salmonella enteritidis acquired from the consumption of eggs or egg products
§ 57.18 - Requirements for commercial pullet grower flocks found positive for salmonella enteritidis
§ 57.19 - Special requirements for library and experimental gene pool flocks found positive for salmonella enteritidis
§ 57.20 - Biosecurity and maintenance
§ 57.21 - Packing plant records
§ 57.22 - Compliance
§ 57.23 - Severability
§ 57.24 to 57.34 - Deleted
§ 57.40 to 57.43 - Deleted
§ 57.50 to 57.53 - Deleted
§ 57.60 to 57.64 - Deleted
§ 57.70 to 57.71 - Deleted

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 57

Statutory authority: Agriculture and Markets Law, §§ 16[1], 18, 72, 199-a[1], 200[3], 214-b

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
